About this projectÂ¶

This project was realised during my first year of Master in computer science at the University of Angers for a collaboration between LERIA and MolTech Anjou. The objective was to study the work done by Xiufeng Yang et al. with ChemTS and Masato Sumita et al. Hunting for Organic Molecules with Artificial Intelligence and try to reproduce it from the code of ChemTS on Github an look for improvement.
